ul.li: Be sure to read the connected device's user manual before use.
Purchase a cable suitable for the device to be connected.
Fully insert the plug of the connecting cable.
Stop music playback when plugging and unplugging cables.

Before using the product for the first time, it is necessary to install the "dedicated driver software" on your PC (only for Windows). Please download from our Audio-Technic website. Before connecting the product to your PC, be sure to install the "dedicated driver software". If you connect the product to your PC before installing the driver, the product may not work properly.
